question.title: how to hide black border on side near camera on full screen game android studio
question.body:
On the left side, there is a black color. I tried to find a way to remove it but I still can't. I tried switching the screen to the other side and it was the same, but it would switch to the other side, but it was at the front camera. I tried to open other apps and it was normal.

I use this code and the navigation bar disappears but the camera doesn't.

  getWindow().getDecorView().setSystemUiVisibility(
        View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_IMMERSIVE_STICKY
        | View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_HIDE_NAVIGATION
        | View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_FULLSCREEN
        | View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_HIDE_NAVIGATION
        | View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_FULLSCREEN
        | View.SYSTEM_UI_FLAG_LAYOUT_STABLE
    );

I want to find a way to fix it so that the full screen hides all the black.
